echo:PlaceholderRelic.NAME: Placeholder Relic
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain #b2 #yecho:Ultimate_Charge.

echo:PlaceholderBossRelic.NAME: Placeholder Boss Relic
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yPlaceholder #yRelic. Stay #yecho:Charged regardless of #yecho:Ultimate_Charge. Permanently lose 1 [E].
